## ContractSpec Web – LLM Guide

Purpose
- Marketing + documentation hub for the ContractSpec stack (specs, AI ops, lifecycle engine).

Primary Sections
- Landing Hero (`/`) – overview tiles for specs, overlays, lifecycle guidance.
- Docs index (`/docs`) – cards linking to installation, specs, AI toolkit, lifecycle engine.
- Blog/Changelog (static MDX feed).

Routing
- `/` landing
- `/docs` documentation index (App Router page)
- `/docs/product/lifecycle-stages` lifecycle reference

Authentication
- None; static Next.js site.

APIs Consumed
- Static content only; optional PostHog analytics (browser SDK) with documented events in `docs/llms.txt`.

Lifecycle Surface
- Quick links promote lifecycle docs.
- CTA copy references @lssm/bundle.lifecycle-managed for managed guidance.

LLM Usage
- Use this file to understand routing + entry points.
- For deep lifecycle implementation, read `docs/product/lifecycle-stages.md` + `docs/tech/lifecycle-stage-system.md`.
